title: Can't recover account?
body:
I have been trying to recover my main account since yesterday.  I have used the forgot user name/ forgot password and i do not receive any emails. ( i have check spam and all other folders)  I submitted a ticket yesterday and even on early today and have heard nothing back so i figured if theres a tiny chance of help here i would try.  
I have not been on lol for a long while and wanted to play with some friends but cannot access my account?  I have tried all my passwords i use and nothing and non of the recovery tools are working.  I looked up and found some old post i have made in the past and noticed that my account doesnt have a summoner icon, i dont know what that means.  I'm scared my account may of been hacked?  but i don't know and i am not hearing anything back from support.

replies.body: 3rd day and no response from my ticket support :( any help please i dont want to lose this account

I'll need your ticket number so I can check your ticket, but just as a heads-up, all account recovery tickets (if submitted correctly) will be done via email from your end, so you'll see a reply in your inbox once you get one. Additionally, the Holidays slammed us pretty hard, so response times a bit longer because of that, just letting you know. :)

Let me know if you have any questions.

i finally got the account back literally like 15 mins before you posted.  Someone hacked the account and i got it back.  Unfortunately they spent all my saved ip on a name change and other stuff so im trying to see if it can get reverted or refunded.
Thanks for replying though, i was really worried i was going to lose this account after having it for like 6 years
i cant check the status of my tickets because i cant login to that account since i dont have the password -_-

for some reason i am having some weird error with the account i posted this on so i have to use this one?  It isnt even showing that i posted it with that account at all :/ 
I have reciepts from rp purchases and everything.  I dont want to lose this account i have had it for a very long time and have invested alot of money into it.
